title: President, MetroWest Conference For Women
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: "The success of all women, depends on the strength of our network and our level of commitment to personal growth, while supporting the advancement of others. This Conference is the means by which this can happen in our region. Providing this platform for women to achieve their extraordinary lives is my passion and I am grateful to serve."

title: Community Relations Manager
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: It is important to me to see women collaborating, sharing ideas, and encouraging each other to be extraordinary. By working together with women and men in the MetroWest region, we are able to harness the energy of this active community and work together to ensure the next generation of women and girls have every opportunity afforded to them!

title: Economic Development Director
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: The MetroWest Conference for Women will provide resources, encouragement, a sense of community and lasting connections for anyone that desires to be a part of something larger. This conference will inspire and unite our region moving us forward together.

title: Owner
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: I'm excited about the MetroWest Conference for Women as it will bring resources directly to MetroWest to empower women to live authentic lives, to inspire women to reach their goals, and to support women seeking leadership roles.

title: Director Career Services and Employer Relations
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: Bringing a diverse world-class conference to the MetroWest area is imperative for enhancing the professional, educational, leadership and personal development and lives of attendees inside and outside our community. My hope for the attendees is that they will participate in a wide array of presentations/workshops and create networking and mentoring opportunities for impactful and enduring personal growth.

title: Director of Development
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: The Women of MetroWest deserve a world-class conference to help them move forward with their creative ideas, employment goals and personal aspirations. I believe this conference will help women achieve their dreams, establish a lasting network of female colleagues and develop long-term relationships that will yield many positive results.

title: Director
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: The talents and gifts of women add to the value and quality of any community they are engaged in. I believe this conference will support the addition or expansion of these qualities to more communities.

title: CEO
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: The most powerful energy on the planet is when women collaborate. I am passionate about helping women grow personally and professionally

title: District Counsel
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: B/C it is important

company: Framingham Housing Authority Commissioner, Framingham Charter Commissioner, Resiliency For Life Board of Directors
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: Refer to jen

title: Assistant Director
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: I'm excited about an event focused on issues and interests that is engaging and most importantly, uniting for the women of MetroWest.

title: Co-Owner
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: The MetroWest area has a huge amount of woman with talent to inspire and support each other in growth.

title: Financial Advisor
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: I feel very strongly that great things happen when women empower women. The impact of an empowering piece of advice, a word of  encouragement, or an act of inspiration can manifest into something far greater than one first thought possible to achieve. #Ownyourextraordinarylife

title: President
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: "The world is experiencing the collective ills that come as a direct response to the imbalance of power.  The time has come for the awakened feminine power to effect the changes necessary to heal the world and create a future that respects all individuals and nurtures talent and ability."

title: Owner
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: “This conference will not only empower and educate the attendees but it will help shine a spotlight on the talent, passion and confidence the women of the MetroWest region possess."

title: Public Information Officer
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: “In today’s environment, it is especially important for women to come together, share experiences, educate and elevate one another. Being a part of the MetroWest Conference For Women, Inc. will allow me the opportunity to help others to rise to the next level of their journey and will allow me to continue to grow and evolve.”

title: Healthcare Professional
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: As a leader, mentor, and mother, its important for me to find ways to support and coach our future women leaders to ensure they have opportunities for growth and shine bright in both their personal and professional lives.  I'm excited to be a part of the MetroWest Women's conference as its important for me to demonstrate the importance of equality, empowerment and accessibility to education for all, to creating a level playing field for all of us to succeed.  In addition, I'm excited to grow my own professional network and to learn and gain strength from my peers.

title: Director, PSW Youth Careers
company: Partnerships for a Skilled Workforce, Inc.
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: At PSW Youth Careers, we strive to teach all young women to see their value, and step forward as future leaders of the workforce.  I believe it is our job to educate women about employment, economic trends for strong careers and life-sustaining wages.

title: AVP Social Media & Brand Communications
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: “MetroWest is one of the fastest growing communities in Massachusetts, with more residents and businesses than ever before.  I believe it’s important for women in the MetroWest area to have a conference and resources that will continue to help this region and it’s women leaders grow while promoting a sense of pride in the region we serve”

title: President & CEO
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: "The MetroWest Conference for Women is important for the community as it will bring together women from all over the region to learn and grow personally and professionally. It will also create a greater sense of community and provide networking opportunities specific to the MetroWest region that are not available elsewhere."

title: Attorney
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: Empowered women are contagious. We all benefit when we raise each other up. I was fortunate to grow up without limits on what I could accomplish based on my gender. Every woman deserves that. For those who didn't grow up in that culture, it is important that they know it now and perpetuate it to younger women.

title: Operations Manager
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: The MetroWest Conference for Women is working to support women in MetroWest. As an elected official in Ashland and as a women who has been in the workforce for over 30 years, I believe this is needed in our community. I am excited to be working with Jen Maseda and the other women who are joining forces to create this conference.

title: Assistant Store Manager
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: A quote that I grew up hearing was “Be a girl with a mind, a women with attitude and a lady with class”.  It is an honor to be a part of the MetroWest Conference for Women, and be on a mission to engage, educate and inspire those around us daily to achieve more when we unite together.

title: CEO
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: The MetroWest region has been like a sleeping giant of talent and economic growth, and it is waking! Because of the unique combination of passion for success and community, MetroWest Women are perfectly positioned to be at the forefront of growth and opportunity. MWCFW is a tangible way to bring women together to make sure we are ready reach for those opportunities and that we support one another's success.

title: Director of Inclusive Excellence Initiatives
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: First, I believe that women rock and when we come together to support one another we rock even more. I am new to the MetroWest, but I believe in the community and would do anything that I can to support the women in this community.

title: Marketing Consultant & Communication Coach
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: In a world overrun by competition and conflict, I'm thrilled to be a part of a community of women that help each other stand up. We stand stronger together than any one of us who stands alone.

title: Social Media Strategist
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: It's inspiring to be connecting with so many empowered women in metrowest!

title: Communications Associate
personalStatementAboutMwcfw: I loved growing up in the MetroWest area. There are so many powerful, strong women doing amazing things and we need to be celebrating, empowering, and lifting each other up.
